title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the basics of C programming language, covering syntax, data types, and simple algorithms.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Understand fundamental algorithms and their implementations to solve problems efficiently.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Master the use of C++ in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) with hands-on examples.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Learn about fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: A beginner's guide to Object-Oriented Programming in Python, with practical coding examples.

title: Software Engineering
description: Explore the principles and methodologies of software engineering, including development and testing.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Gain insights into cloud computing with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and its applications.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Learn how to design, manage, and query databases using MySQL.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Improve your problem-solving skills by tackling various challenges and algorithms.
